Class GenericSubEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • ray.rage.scene.generic.AbstractGenericRenderable
      • ray.rage.scene.generic.GenericSubEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Disposable, Renderable, SubEntity

    final class GenericSubEntity
extends AbstractGenericRenderable
implements SubEntity
    A generic SubEntity implementation.

    Raymond L. Rivera

      • getBoneIndexBuffer

        public java.nio.FloatBuffer getBoneIndexBuffer()
        Description copied from interface: Renderable
        Gets this renderable's bone index buffer.

        Bone indices are used to "point to" specific bones in a skeleton for the vertices to be modified by that specific bone. This also utilizes the boneWeightBuffer for specifying how much the vertex's position is modified by said bone.

        Specified by:
        getBoneIndexBuffer in interface Renderable
        Returns:
        The bone index buffer.

      • notifyDispose

        public void notifyDispose()
        Description copied from interface: Disposable
        Explicitly releases the internal resources held by this instance, making it unusable afterwards.

        WARNING: This method is meant to be used internally by the framework and not by game clients. Use directly only if you really know what you're doing.

        Specified by:
        notifyDispose in interface Disposable
        Overrides:
        notifyDispose in class AbstractGenericRenderable
